item.description:
Please RSVP!

 Trading Options for Income by Dan Sheridan

 

Dan Sheridan will discuss the principles of trading options for monthly income, while minimizing risk.   He’ll show how he is tweaking some of the most popular income strategies in the current market environment.    

 

Next, Dan will focus on butterfly trades and show 2 – 3 different ways of trading this versatile strategy in the current markets to bring in monthly income. 

 

Dan is a veteran options trader, who traded in the CBOE pit for 22 years.  He worked for Mercury Trading, with Jon and Pete Najarian, making markets in options.  Since 2004, Dan has run Sheridan Options Mentoring, which provides practical options education to retail traders.  Dan hosts the popular show "Options Safari" on CBOE TV, which runs twice weekly. He is currently hosting a new CBOE seminar series titled: Be a Successful Retail Options Trader, which is 5 seminars, each focusing on a specific strategy and including some of the best retail practitioners of these strategies in the country. He also does monthly webinars for option brokers including Think or Swim, Options Monster, OptionsXpress, and Trade King.

  

You can find parking behind the building, or one block West off Amherst Street.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

To join our online discussion go to http://groups.google.com/bostonibd .  If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you! Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room. We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone. This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: Special Speakers Meeting: Dan Sheridan on Trading Options for Income
